ygData.subject: RE: jewelcraft trivial
ygData.msgSnippet: I found malachite was trivial around 17 or 18.  But I agree that a skill raise shouldn t come on a trivial item. Nimue Tunare. According to the illustrious
ygData.messageBody:
I found malachite was trivial around 17 or 18. But I agree that a skill
raise shouldn't come on a trivial item.
Nimue
Tunare.

According to the illustrious Dorris, Bob...
:)From: "Dorris, Bob" <bob_dorris@...>
:)
:)
:)Ah, you learn well grasshopper.
:)
:)The point was (I have a 18th level enchanter on another server with 90+
:)skill in jewelcraft), at skill level 20, malachite should not be trivial.
:)But I got a message saying it was when I made the item. The very NEXT time
:)I tried making the malachite I got the skill raise. I know you learn when
:)you fail, but you shouldnt learn if it is trivial.
:)
:)Valore
